Use the button below to see what the con: Use the button below to see what the content of the cookie policy looked like at the time of the user's consent. Styles, e.g. from your theme, which may have influenced the cookie policy page, are not taken into account.
Cookie policy as at the time of consent: Cookie policy as at the time of consent
Naming of requested consent types in fir: Naming of requested consent types in first view
Collect additional data via URL paramete: Collect additional data via URL parameters
You can add the legal links in the free: You can add the legal links in the free version of Real Cookie Banner as menu items or shortcodes (e.g. in your website footer).
Show a sticky legal links widget on the: Show a sticky legal links widget on the bottom of your website
Sticky legal links are now disabled on y: Sticky legal links are now disabled on your website
Sticky legal links are now enabled on yo: Sticky legal links are now enabled on your website
Display a sticky icon on your website th: Display a sticky icon on your website that makes the legal links easily accessible on every subpage. Not only does it look fancy, it also boosts your data protection!
Want to show legal links with a sticky i: Want to show legal links with a sticky icon?
This consent was documented with a Real: This consent was documented with a Real Cookie Banner version prior to 4.1.0. Due to rework to comply with the TCF 2.2 standard, interactions with the currently installed version of Real Cookie Banner are no longer playable. However, they are still documented in the consent export. If you need to play the interactions, please request an old Real Cookie Banner version from the {{aSupport}}support{{/aSupport}}.

This consent was documented with a Real Cookie Banner version prior to 3.10.0. Due to rework to comply with the {{aAct}}European Accessibility Act{{/aAct}}, interactions with the currently installed version of Real Cookie Banner are no longer playable. However, they are still documented in the consent export. If you need to play the interactions, please request an old Real Cookie Banner version from the {{aSupport}}support{{/aSupport}}.
Safe countries in terms of the GDPR: Safe countries in terms of the GDPR
Consent for data processing in unsafe th: Consent for data processing in unsafe third countries
The process of how the website visitor i: The process of how the website visitor interacted with the cookie banner to give consent was recorded for documentation purposes. You can replay the interactions. Note that the recording may not be fully accurate if, for example, you use custom CSS on your website or the visitor used a translating browser extension.

The process of how the website visitor interacted with the content blocker to give consent was recorded for documentation purposes. You can replay the interactions. Note that the dimensions of the content blocker and consent dialog do not have to be the same as the ones that were displayed to the website visitor, and the recording may not be fully accurate if, for example, you use custom CSS on your website or the visitor used a translating browser extension.
legal-text\u0004You have successfully re: You have successfully revoked consent for services with its cookies and personal data processing. The page will be reloaded now!
For data protection reasons, IP addresse: For data protection reasons, IP addresses, depending on the configuration of the cookie banner, were only shortened by the last octet and stored hashed. In this case, you can only assign consents to individual IP addresses with a high probability, but not with absolute certainty. Therefore, also match the time of consent to narrow down your search for the proper consent!
Are you sure you want to delete this ent: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
Copy the generated shortcode and paste i: Copy the generated shortcode and paste it into your website.
After the consent is revoked, the page w: After the consent is revoked, the page will be reloaded. Let the user know what happened with a success message.
The user must be able to clearly underst: The user must be able to clearly understand the behaviour of the link/button from the name.
If you want to apply a custom style to t: If you want to apply a custom style to the link/button, the shortcode output should be tagged with an ID attribute.
It is recommended to use a simple link i: It is recommended to use a simple link in your footer instead of a button to avoid visual misunderstandings.
Successfully added the links to your men: Successfully added the links to your menu!
If you have allowed to log IP addresses,: If you have allowed to log IP addresses, you can view them here. Otherwise you will see a salted hash of the IP address (truncated).
Unique name of the consent given: Unique name of the consent given
This consent was implicitly given by a c: This consent was implicitly given by a configured bypass.
This consent was implicitly given by Con: This consent was implicitly given by Consent Forwarding.
This consent has been given in a content: This consent has been given in a content blocker.
This consent was given automatically bec: This consent was given automatically because the browser sent a 'Do Not Track' header. Accordingly, only essential services have been consented to.
Just to be sure: Do you really want to d: Just to be sure: Do you really want to delete all consents?
Are you sure you want to delete all cons: Are you sure you want to delete all consents? You should only do this if it is absolutely necessary. In case you want to continue, make sure you have {{a}}exported{{/a}} all consents beforehand (for legal reasons).
Use the button below to export all conse: Use the button below to export all consents in a machine readable form.
We generate the cookie banner from all (: We generate the cookie banner from all (design) settings and services that the visitor has seen. You can see exactly how consent was obtained and track clicks on buttons.
Use the button below to see what the coo: Use the button below to see what the cookie banner looked like at the time of the user's consent. The services/groups selected there also look the way the user saw them. A button framed in red shows which button the user clicked on at the time of consent.
Cookie banner as at the time of consent: Cookie banner as at the time of consent
There is no preview for this consent, as: There is no preview for this consent, as it was given implicitly by forwarding the consent. The user has given his/her consent via {{a}}%s{{/a}}, and this consent has been forwarded automatically.
We generate the content blocker that you: We generate the content blocker that your visitor has seen from all settings, design preferences and services. You can see exactly how his or her consent was obtained and track clicks on buttons.
You want to see what was displayed to th: You want to see what was displayed to the visitor?
The consent to the service was given via: The consent to the service was given via a content blocker. Below you can see how the content blocker looked like when the user consented.
Content Blocker as at the time of consen: Content Blocker as at the time of consent
There is no preview for this consent, as: There is no preview for this consent, as it was given implicitly by {{strong}}%s bypass{{/strong}}.

You can get several statistics about how: You can get several statistics about how your users use the cookie banner. This helps you to calculate the total number of users who do not want to be tracked, for example, by extrapolating data from Google Analytics.
